description:
If /etc/mtab does not exist, test_validate_volume_no_mtab_entry() fails with:
  OSError: [Errno 2] No such file or directory: '/etc/mtab'

Full traceback:
  http://paste.ubuntu.com/25227227/

Ideally this would check if /etc/mtab exists before running the test.
title: test_validate_volume_no_mtab_entry depends on /etc/mtab

comments.content:
If /etc/mtab does not exist, test_validate_volume_no_mtab_entry() fails with:
  OSError: [Errno 2] No such file or directory: '/etc/mtab'

Full traceback:
  http://paste.ubuntu.com/25227227/
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~corey.bryant

comments.content: Ideally, I'd think we should just mock the psutil call, but meh, let's discuss that on the review.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~sylvain-bauza

comments.content: Hmm, besides fixing e.g. the test this should be reported to the psutils lib (https://github.com/giampaolo/psutil/issues). Which distro / env did this come up with?
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~2-silvan

comments.content: It happens during Ubuntu package builds on Launchpad. The chroot that the build occurs in doesn't have /etc/mtab.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~corey.bryant

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/495485
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:
Modeled the mock after the same fix in Cinder: https://bugs.launchpad.net/cinder/+bug/1675861

Unit test runs OK locally.

csuttles@toybox:[~/src/nova]: source .tox/py27/bin/activate
(py27) [Exit: 0] 22:25
csuttles@toybox:[~/src/nova]: python -m testtools.run nova.tests.unit.virt.libvirt.volume.test_quobyte.QuobyteTestCase.test_validate_volume_no_mtab_entry
Tests running...

Ran 1 test in 0.034s
OK
(py27) [Exit: 0] 22:26
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~killface007

comments.content: workflow is failing, but doesn't seem related to the change.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~killface007

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/495485
Committed: https://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/nova/commit/?id=e1ad386f9828a6c9caf3c0cb962a3912c9a3885a
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit e1ad386f9828a6c9caf3c0cb962a3912c9a3885a
Author: Chris Suttles <email address hidden>
Date:   Fri Aug 18 22:27:43 2017 -0700

    Fix quobyte test_validate_volume_no_mtab_entry
    
    Fix test_validate_volume_no_mtab_entry. Currently depends on /etc/mtab,
    this patches and mocks psutil.disk_partitions, which is the source of
    the dependency.
    
    Change-Id: Ie10b134a1840b1277c0c4059f634a6bafd256c2d
    Closes-Bug: #1708196
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
